this_title: Ben Webster: The Brute and the Beautiful
introduction: A Danish/Dutch/English coproduced with Ben Webster Foundation documentary about The Brute and the Beautiful. Ernie Wilkins, Kenny Drew, Benny Carter, Jesper Thilo, Harold Ashby, Ronnie Scott, Jimmy Witherspoon, Milt Hinton, Mercer Ellington, Jimmy Rowles Harry "Sweets" Edison, Joyce Cockrell.................................................................................Released - 10 February 1990....
